channel.title: How do i turn my server online so other people can go on it?
channel.description: Now i made a no-ip account and did all that stuff, what do i do necxt to turn it online?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2007, 09:56:47 PM[/size][hr]Someone Help[br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2007, 10:01:40 PM[/size][hr]some1 please help its probably a simple question to most of you guys

item.title: How do i turn my server online so other people can go on it?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

After you get a no-ip you gotta forward your ports by going to Mod Taharok’s Ultimate Server Guide. If you need ANY help with starting a hamachi server go to this link (to my website for a download)
http://www.freewebs.com/linscape/smh.htm It gives you the option to download the latest version of my SMH, which helps you on MANY things.
